description: Template hooks configuration for Claude Code plugins

hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code needs attention" with title "Claude Code"'

_comments.usage: This template demonstrates all available hook events in Claude Code
events: PreToolUse - Executes before tool calls (can block them)
PostToolUse - Runs after tool calls complete
UserPromptSubmit - Triggers when users submit prompts
Notification - Fires when Claude sends notifications
Stop - Runs when Claude finishes responding
SubagentStop - Executes when subagent tasks complete
SessionStart - Triggers on new or resumed sessions
matcher_options: Multiple matchers can be defined for the same event
_comments.security_warning: Hooks run automatically with your environment credentials. Always review hook implementations before registering them.

examples.auto_format: PostToolUse hook with prettier/gofmt for automatic code formatting
examples.production_guard: PreToolUse hook to block edits to production files
examples.audit_logging: Track all tool executions for compliance
examples.custom_notifications: Alert systems when Claude needs input
